h1: Copper Ore Crushing Plant in Chile
introduction:
In 2011, the clients contacted our sales person in Chile branch office. The clients wanted to set up a copper ore crushing plant with the following requirements:
Material: copper ore
Max. feed size: 900mm
Final product size: 0-6mm
Capacity: 100-120tph
flow: Our sales person paid a visit to our clients immediately after receiving their inquiry about the running condition of their current production line. After discussion, we suggest  them to use the following equipments: Vibrating Feeder, Jaw Crusher, CS series Cone Crusher, Vibrating Screen and Belt Conveyors. SBMâ€™s professional approach has convinced the clients on our design. We provided our clients with a high rate of return on investment.
